entries.journal_entry_description: Hunt and kill walluga skullsmashers on the Rryatt Trail.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Your first trial given by Krepauk is to hunt 16 walluga skullsmashers on the Rryatt Trail.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Hunting Wallugas on the Rryatt Trail
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Return to Krepauk and let him know of your success hunting walluga skullsmashers.
